ne10:3.3: “Dhunatha maccuno senam, nalagaramva kunjaro”ti pannaya padatthanam.
ne10:3.6: “Dhunatha maccuno senam, nalagaramva kunjaro”ti pannindriyassa padatthanam.
ne10:4.1: Ayunjantanam va sattanam yoge, yunjantanam va arambho.
ne10:5.1: Tattha ye na yunjanti, te pamadamulaka na yunjanti.
ne10:5.2: So pamado duvidho tanhamulako avijjamulako ca.
ne10:5.3: Tattha avijjamulako yena annanena nivuto neyyatthanam nappajanati pancakkhandha uppadavayadhammati, ayam avijjamulako.
ne10:5.4: Yo tanhamulako, so tividho anuppannanam bhoganam uppadaya pariyesanto pamadam apajjati, uppannanam bhoganam arakkhanimittam paribhoganimittanca pamadam apajjati ayam loke catubbidho pamado ekavidho avijjaya tividho tanhaya.
ne10:5.7: Tam kissa hetu, rupisu bhavesu ajjhosanam, arupisu sammoho?
ne10:5.8: Tattha rupakayo rupakkhandho namakayo cattaro arupino khandha.
ne10:5.9: Ime pancakkhandha katamena upadanena saupadana, tanhaya ca avijjaya ca?
ne10:5.10: Tattha tanha dve upadanani kamupadananca silabbatupadananca.
ne10:5.12: Imehi catuhi upadanehi ye saupadana khandha, idam dukkham.
ne10:5.15: Tesam bhagava parinnaya pahanaya ca dhammam deseti dukkhassa parinnaya samudayassa pahanaya.
ne10:6.1: Tattha yo tividho tanhamulako pamado anuppannanam bhoganam uppadaya pariyesati, uppannanam bhoganam arakkhananca karoti paribhoganimittanca, tassa sampativedhena rakkhana patisamharana, ayam samatho.
ne10:7.2: Yada janati kamanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato okaranca sankilesanca vodananca nekkhamme ca anisamsam.
ne10:7.3: Tattha ya vimamsa upaparikkha ayam vipassana.
ne10:7.4: Ime dve dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti samatho ca vipassana ca.
ne10:7.5: Imesu dvisu dhammesu bhaviyamanesu dve dhamma pahiyanti tanha ca avijja ca, imesu dvisu dhammesu pahinesu cattari upadanani nirujjhanti.
ne10:7.6: Upadananirodha bhavanirodho, bhavanirodha jatinirodho, jatinirodha jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
ne10:7.8: Iti purimakani ca dve saccani dukkham samudayo ca, samatho ca vipassana ca maggo.
ne10:9.4: Yo etassa dhammassa paccayo ayam avijja.
ne10:9.6: Ime dve kilesa tanha ca avijja ca.
ne10:9.7: Tani cattari upadanani tehi catuhi upadanehi ye saupadana khandha, idam dukkham.
ne10:9.10: Tesam bhagava parinnaya ca pahanaya ca dhammam deseti dukkhassa parinnaya samudayassa pahanaya.
ne10:10.2: Yena tanhanusayassa paccayam avijjam varayati, ayam vipassana.
ne10:10.3: Ime dve dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti samatho ca vipassana ca.
ne10:10.4: Tattha samathassa phalam ragaviraga cetovimutti, vipassanaya phalam avijjaviraga pannavimutti.
ne10:10.5: Iti purimakani ca dve saccani dukkham samudayo ca, samatho vipassana ca maggo, dve ca vimuttiyo nirodho.
ne10:12.1: Sabbapapam nama tini duccaritani kayaduccaritam vaciduccaritam manoduccaritam, te dasa akusalakammapatha panatipato adinnadanam kamesumicchacaro musavado pisuna vaca pharusa vaca samphappalapo abhijjha byapado micchaditthi, tani dve kammani cetana cetasikanca.
ne10:12.2: Tattha yo ca panatipato ya ca pisuna vaca ya ca pharusa vaca, idam dosasamutthanam.
ne10:12.3: Yanca adinnadanam yo ca kamesumicchacaro yo ca musavado, idam lobhasamutthanam, yo samphappalapo, idam mohasamutthanam.
ne10:13.1: Akusalamulam payogam gacchantam catubbidham agatim gacchati chanda dosa bhaya moha.
ne10:13.2: Tattha yam chanda agatim gacchati, idam lobhasamutthanam.
ne10:13.3: Yam dosa agatim gacchati, idam dosasamutthanam.
ne10:13.4: Yam bhaya ca moha ca agatim gacchati, idam mohasamutthanam.
ne10:14.1: Sabbapapam nama attha micchattani micchaditthi micchasankappo micchavaca micchakammanto micchaajivo micchavayamo micchasati micchasamadhi, idam vuccati sabbapapam.
ne10:14.2: Imesam atthannam micchattanam ya akiriya akaranam anajjhacaro, idam vuccati sabbapapassa akaranam.
ne10:15.1: Atthasu micchattesu pahinesu attha sammattani sampajjanti.
ne10:15.2: Atthannam sammattanam ya kiriya karanam sampadanam, ayam vuccati kusalassa upasampada.
ne10:15.3: Sacittapariyodapananti atitassa maggassa bhavanakiriyam dassayati, citte pariyodapite pancakkhandha pariyodapita bhavanti, evanhi bhagava aha—
ne10:15.5: Duvidha hi pariyodapana nivaranappahananca anusayasamugghato ca.
ne10:15.6: Dve pariyodapanabhumiyo dassanabhumi ca, bhavanabhumi ca, tattha yam pativedhena pariyodapeti, idam dukkham.
ne10:17.1: Dhammo nama duvidho indriyasamvaro maggo ca.
ne10:17.2: Duggati nama duvidha devamanusse va upanidhaya apaya duggati, nibbanam va upanidhaya sabba upapattiyo duggati.
ne10:17.3: Tattha ya samvarasile akhandakarita, ayam dhammo sucinno apayehi rakkhati.
ne10:17.5: “dvema, bhikkhave, silavato gatiyo deva ca manussa ca”.
ne10:17.6: Evanca nalandayam nigame asibandhakaputto gamani bhagavantam etadavoca—
ne10:18.1: “Brahmana, bhante, pacchabhumaka kamandaluka sevalamalika udakorohaka aggiparicaraka, te matam kalankatam uyyapenti nama, sannapenti nama, saggam nama okkamenti.
ne10:18.2: Bhagava pana, bhante, araham sammasambuddho pahoti tatha katum, yatha sabbo loko kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya”ti.
ne10:19.1: “Tena hi, gamani, tannevettha patipucchissami, yatha te khameyya, tatha nam byakareyyasiti.
ne10:20.1: Tam kim mannasi, gamani, idhassa puriso panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthiko, tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjatu’ti.
ne10:20.2: Tam kim mannasi, gamani, api nu so puriso mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetuva panjalikam anuparisakkanahetu va kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya”ti.
ne10:21.1: “Seyyathapi, gamani, puriso mahatim puthusilam gambhire udakarahade pakkhipeyya, tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ummujja, bho, puthusile, uplava bho puthusile, thalamuplava, bho puthusile’ti.
ne10:21.2: Tam kim mannasi, gamani, api nu sa mahati puthusila mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalikam anuparisakkanahetu va ummujjeyya va uplaveyya va thalam va uplaveyya”ti.
ne10:21.4: “Evameva kho, gamani, yo so puriso panatipati …pe…
ne10:21.5: micchaditthiko, kincapi nam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjatu’ti.
ne10:21.6: Atha kho so puriso kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya.
ne10:22.1: Tam kim mannasi, gamani, idhassa puriso panatipata pativirato adinnadana pativirato kamesumicchacara pativirato musavada pativirato pisunaya vacaya pativirato pharusaya vacaya pativirato samphappalapa pativirato anabhijjhalu abyapannacitto sammaditthiko, tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjatu’ti.
ne10:22.2: Tam kim mannasi, gamani, api nu so puriso mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalikam anuparisakkanahetu va kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya”ti.
ne10:23.1: “Seyyathapi, gamani, puriso sappikumbham va telakumbham va gambhire udakarahade ogahetva bhindeyya.
ne10:23.2: Tatra yassa sakkharakathalam, sa adhogami assa.
ne10:23.3: Yanca khvassa tatra sappi va telam va, tam uddhangami assa.
ne10:23.4: Tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘osida, bho sappitela, samsida, bho sappitela, adho gaccha, bho sappitela’ti.
ne10:23.5: Tam kim mannasi gamani, api nu tam sappitelam mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalikam anuparisakkanahetu va ‘osideyya va samsideyya va adho va gaccheyya’”ti.
ne10:24.1: “Evameva kho, gamani, yo so puriso panatipata pativirato …pe…
ne10:24.2: sammaditthiko, kincapi nam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjatu’”ti.
ne10:24.3: Atha kho so puriso kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya.
ne10:24.5: Tattha ya maggassa tikkhata adhimattata, ayam dhammo sucinno sabbahi upapattihi rakkhati.
ne10:26.1: Tattha duggatinam hetu tanha ca avijja ca, tani cattari upadanani, tehi catuhi upadanehi ye saupadana khandha, idam dukkham.
ne10:26.3: Pancakkhandha dukkham, tesam bhagava parinnaya ca pahanaya ca dhammam deseti dukkhassa parinnaya samudayassa pahanaya.
ne10:26.6: Pancindriyani rupini rakkhanto samadhim bhavayati, tanhanca nigganhati.
ne10:26.7: Manindriyam rakkhanto vipassanam bhavayati, avijjanca nigganhati.
ne10:26.8: Tanhaniggahena dve upadanani pahiyanti kamupadananca silabbatupadananca.
ne10:26.9: Avijjaniggahena dve upadanani pahiyanti ditthupadananca attavadupadananca.
ne10:26.10: Catusu upadanesu pahinesu dve dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti samatho ca vipassana ca.
ne10:27.1: Tattha brahmacariyassa phalam cattari samannaphalani sotapattiphalam sakadagamiphalam anagamiphalam arahattam aggaphalam.
ne10:27.3: Iti purimakani ca dve saccani dukkham samudayo ca.
ne10:27.4: Samatho ca vipassana ca brahmacariyanca maggo, brahmacariyassa phalani ca tadarammana ca asankhatadhatu nirodho.
ne10:28.1: Tattha yam pativedhena rakkhati, idam dukkham.
